Graphique module¶

Expanding mean of the security share graphic classes¶

class src.graphics.graph_exp_mean_share_cyber.GraphExpMeanShareCyber(analyse)¶

Bases: src.graphics.graphic_base.GraphicBase

Draws the expanding mean of the security share of a CRTC.

Parameters

analyse (analysis.Analyse) – analysis.Analyse instance.

class src.graphics.graph_exp_mean_share_cyber.GraphExpMeanShareCyberSmall(analyse, crtc_code)¶

Bases: src.graphics.graphic_base.GraphicBase

Draws the small version of the expanding mean of the security share of a CRTC.

Parameters

  • analyse (src.analysis.Analyse) – src.analysis.Analyse instance.

  • crtc_code (str) – CRTC code.

GraphicBase class¶

class src.graphics.graphic_base.GraphicBase(suptitle, title, xlabel, ylabel, date_format=True, figsize=(30, 15), fontsize=30)¶

Bases: object

Standard template graphic. It uses LaTeX.

Parameters

  • suptitle (str) – Suptitle name of the graphic.

  • title (str) – Title name of the graphic.

  • xlabel (str) – X-axis name.

  • ylabel (str) – Y-axis name.

  • date_format (bool) – use or not the date formatter on the X-axis.

  • figsize ((int, int)) – size of the figure.

  • fontsize (int) – font size.

add_text_legend(text, plot=None) → None¶

Adds text into the legend box, the text can be associated to a plot. The method show_legend() must be call at the end of all add_text_legend() calling.

Parameters

  • text (str) – Text to add into the legend box.

  • plot – Return a plt.plot(), to associate text to this plot.

save_graph(result_folder, file_name) → None¶

Saves the graphic into result_folder, create the path if it doesn’t exist. Close the figure too.

Parameters

  • result_folder (str or pathlib.PurePath) – Path to the directory where the file will be saved.

  • file_name (str) – Name of the saved file.

show_graph() → None¶

Shows the graphic and close the figure too.

show_legend(size=15) → None¶

Prints the legend box.

Parameters

size (int) – size of the legend font.
